column5: I will be up in Geraldton early June and then again mid June after out walleye trip. Has anyone detoured and fished the Nipigon river for coasters (brook trout). Can you provide any info on timing, guides etc. Is June a good month? Is that still a good viable fishery? I am hoping to target 3-5 pound brookies? Thank you
June can be a very good month for Brooke’s on the river. A late spring should help. Try Ray Rivard, Quebec Lodge. 807-621-6342[email protected]Use a guide on the river until you’re comfortable. Rgds
